headline: University guide 2018: Newman University, Birmingham
text: newman      Newmans sports lab. Photograph: Newman University    Fees 9,150 for home/EU full-time undergraduate fee in 2017-18. Scholarships Academic achievement scholarships of 10,000 over three years are available for all full-time single and combined honours students on who put Newman as their firm choice on their Ucas application and achieve BBB/ABC (or above) at A2. Visit newman.ac.uk/scholarships/2951 for more information. Accommodation Hall fees cost from 3,900 a year for a standard room to 5,000 for en-suite. Contact Tel: 0121 476 1181Email: admissions@newman.ac.ukWeb: newman.ac.ukAccommodation: k.carter@newman.ac.uk
